full_summary:
### Stop Timer Procurement

**Reference Number:** cb-814-80856716

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246746/A

### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defense (NDN) is soliciting bids for the procurement of 220 Stop Timers (6645-01-713-6116) to be delivered to Montreal, Quebec. The required Stop Timers are designed to meet the specific needs of the NDN.

**Contract Details:**

- **Contract Start Date:** January 31, 2024
- **Contract End Date:** March 1, 2024
- **Procurement Category:** Goods
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Requirements

- **Deliveries:** The Stop Timers must be delivered to the designated delivery address in Montreal, Quebec.
- **Options:** The contract may be exercised with option quantities up to 24 months from the contract award date.
- **Specifications:** The detailed requirement specification is outlined in Annex A (Requirements).
- **Submission:** Bids must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than the tender closing date.

### Additional Information

- **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Christopher Fry
	+ Email: [christopher.fry2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.fry2@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 000-000-0000
- **Patron Right:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate the contract terms with suppliers.

### Supporting Documents

- Stop Timer (Single) - Solicitation Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26909/w8476-246746-stop-timer.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26909/w8476-246746-stop-timer.pdf)
- Stop Timer (Amendment) - Solicitation Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26909/w8476-246746-stop-timer%2Crfp-amendment001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26909/w8476-246746-stop-timer%2Crfp-amendment001.pdf)
